titleStmt.title: The garden of Zion wherein the life and death of godly and wicked men in scriptures are to be seene, from Adam unto the last of the Kings of Judah and Isreal, with the good uses of their life and death. ....
titleStmt.author: Boyd, Zacharie, 1585?-1653.

notesStmt.note: In two volumes; second vol. has title page: The second volume of the Garden of Zion, containing the bookes of Job, Proverbs, Ecclesiastes, and Song of Songs, all in English verse. Glasgow: ... 1644.

Contained within volume 2: The holy songs of the old and new testament: dedicated to the Royall Lady Mary, his Majesties elder daughter, Princess of Orange. / By M. Zacharie Boyd. Printed in Glasgow : by George Anderson, in 1645.
Imperfect: tightly bound with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
